title: My Pixel 1 shuts down at 30%
content:
I found related posts. I'm trying to see if any of the Pixel 1 users have resolved it and none of the posts about showed it as successful.

The only options I see are...
A rescue OTA or a battery replacement.

Has one resolved the fix for pixel shutting down at 30%? It was problematic when I was without a charge and relying on it thinking I had enough battery!
